title: Climats = Climates of Love
abstract: Note: Adapted from the novel by Andre Maurois.
description: Philippe and Odile divorce after a stormy marriage. But Philippe's new relationship with Isabelle proves equally disastrous. Having gone from whimsical Odile to calm and composed Isabelle, Philippe is hopelessely bored and starts looking for a diversion with Misa. Just when happiness and desire seem to come his way, Isabelle and Odile send cries for help.  Credits: Producer, Robert Vignon ; director, Stellio Lorenzi ; writers, Stellio Lorenzi, Rene Cortade, Rodolphe-Maurice Arlaud, Alain Decaux. Cast: Marina Vlady, Jean-Pierre Marielle, Michel Piccoli, Emmanuelle Riva, Alexandra Stewart.
